title: lazy signage.
content:
obviously not a custom piece of work, but notice this upside K in the word 'clock'

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_0041.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419035827/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_0041.jpg) | 251.57 KB |
author: von

comments.content: Both ampersands are forwards. For a movable-letter sign, that's far better than average.

I'm not even gonna try discussing typography in this one.  
But the inverted K in the word “clock” is like a hint at time travel. This is Star Trek sweet.

I don't think those are movable letters. It's probably vinyl letters. Looks like the k and maybe a couple of the other characters are badly cobbled together patches.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419035827/http:/www.thefontry.com/)
